WorkItem.ClosedComment: we won't be able to fix this for v1, adding to the list of features suggested for v2.
WorkItem.Description:
Many JavaScript functions use objects to pass arguments. JSDoc supports documenting these parameters via the following syntax:

``` TypeScript
/**
 * Test function
 * @param args Arguments for this function.
 * @param args.foo The foo parameter.
 * @param args.bar The bar parameter.
 */
 function Test(args: { foo: string; bar: number; }) { }
```

It would be extremely helpful to get intellisense support for these types of parameters. Also, if formatting/skeleton generation is added (see https://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/637), taking these types of parameters into account would also be very helpful.
WorkItem.Summary: JSDoc support for object property arguments

Comments.Message: Thanks for this suggestion, assigned to Jon who handles suggestions.
